entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 09:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain with rain in the morning then to ice pellets in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
